  • Method Details

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest() throws OperationAlreadyStartedException, IOException
      Description copied from class: BaseOperation
      Ensure that only a single request is sent. protocol binding-dependent behavior is implemented in BaseOperation.sendSingleRequest().
      Specified by:
      sendRequest in interface Operation
      Overrides:
      sendRequest in class BaseOperation
      Throws:
      OperationAlreadyStartedException - if the caller attempts to send more than one request
      IOException - if connection to the server is lost or if the request is never received by the server

    • getResponse

      public Response getResponse() throws NoResponseException
      Calls BaseOperation.end() before returning the response. Synchronous operations can only have one response.
      Specified by:
      getResponse in interface Operation
      Overrides:
      getResponse in class BaseOperation
      Returns:
      the server's response
      Throws:
      NoResponseException
